title: KitchenAid Ribbed Soft Silicone Oven Mitt Set, 7"x13", Milkshake 2 Count
description: Perform your kitchen tasks safely with the Kitchen Aid Ribbed Soft Silicone 2-Piece Oven Mitt Set. The textured, ribb stripe design offers a secure grip while handling hot objects. Made of durable and waterproof silicone with a cotton cuff that provides additional shield from the heat and polyester lining that offers comfort and insulation. Each oven mitt measures 7 inches by 13 inches for a generous fit. They are heat resistant up to 500 degrees Fahrenheit. Coordinate these oven mitts with coordinating Kitchen Aid Ribbed Soft Silicone Pot Holders for a complete set.
